value:
$WmMPID_温泉サクラ,ch05_18_Sakura_F_Spa19,Face|Um... I-I don't th-think that this is a
good place for a fight...$k$p$WmMPID_温泉エリーゼ,ch05_25_Elise_F_Spa19,Face|Are you kidding? Don't you ever
horse around in the baths?$k$p$WmMPID_温泉ヒノカ,ch05_26_Hinoka_F_Spa19,Face|I don't think that's exactly what's
going to happen here...$k$p$WmMPID_温泉カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_Spa19,Face|Whatever it is, we had better
prepare ourselves!$k$p$Sbs150|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Phew! That wraps things up for this
mission.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Perfect! We can slip into the hot
spring for a quick bath before we go.
I mean, we're already here...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|An excellent idea. The water looks
perfect...$k$pWait just a minute! It's coming to
me... We'll build baths at our castle.
"Bathe with the Order of Heroes!"$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Commander...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|What a lovely idea! We can bathe with
all of the Heroes. What fun it'll be!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|There's a how-to guide published by
one of the other Annas... You just dig
right down till you hit water!$k$pStarting tomorrow, we'll explore the
castle grounds for the right spot and
then dig, dig, dig!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Hey, $Nu...
While they're doing that, we'll secure
some rope ladders.$k$pKnowing my sister and Anna...they're
going to need someone to haul them
out of a pit.$k$p$Sbs150|
